title: 35 Normal Draft Restriction
body:
So, got a 35 "win" 35 Normal Draft game restriction this weekend. Thank you Riot, guess I have to make yet another account. And use my RP points from the other 3 to send champs to new one. So ridiculous I have to do this every couple months. I don't curse in chat at all, yes sometimes i may tell someone they are bad, but seriously Riot you worried about me telling someone who goes 1/15 that they are bad when I get a kda of 9/0/8. IDk about the rest of the community but I would rather have the most toxic player on the planet on my team that has a KDA like that who i can just go and click on "mute" then someone who feeds, doesn't listen to advice, afk's, trolls, etc etc. Thanks to your garbage system you allow all the trolls and "baddies" literally kill all the joy of attempting to rank up. 

But please Riot explain it to me how you implement a "mute" option but still restrict accounts for "verbal abuse" but do NOTHING about trolls? You people realize that if someone wasn't int feeding enemy team there would be no reason for the flames right???? Oh well guess i could always try DOTA2 or Heros of the storm, I spend probably $600 a year on LoL maybe they can do more with my money then a company who caters trolls who completely ruin your game.

Is "permanent ban" a hard concept to understand? That is what they *want* you to do: go to another game. The little bit of money you can give them does not compare to the damage to their brand that you cause.

That "I" cause, so you are telling me you would rather play a ranked match with a bunch of trolls that cause you to lose then have to mute 1 person and rank up? makes total sense. Guess you also failed to grasp the "if there were't trolls most people wouldn't get flamed" concept either.

I would rather be on a team with someone who was nice but did very poorly instead of someone who was abusive but carried hard. The vast majority of people who play this feel the same way that I do.

I would also rather be on a team with just a troll than be on a team with a troll AND someone who is screaming at the troll.

Regardless of whether the target of your abuse is an unskilled player or an intentional troll, either way nobody wants to hear what you have to say to them.

This is why i have little to no respect for most of the people who play this game anymore.

Here's a hint.  Stop telling bad players that they are bad.  They know, reminding them does nothing but make them report you.  If you would actually try to help them, okay, but that doesn't seem to be what you are doing.  You do well, someone else does poorly, and you think it's perfectly appropriate to say, in whatever terms you do, "hey you're bad".  It's not helping.  In my opinion, and Riot's, you got exactly what you deserved.  The problem comes up when they let you make another account, on which you will inevitably drive away new players while leveling up by telling them they are bad compared to you.  Reading some of your comments in this very thread, such as "road the short bus to school with you" and "Slow kids like this" makes me think Riot should just ban your IP from connecting to the game.  God forbid you actually just win 35 normal games and move on like a mature adult.

Did i ever mention "bad players" nope, didn't think so. I said "trolls, afks, int feeders". Clearly reading is something you do not do often. What drives GOOD players (like myself) away is not only people like you who cannot understand the English language, but trolls who decide to int feed enemy while yours in promo's or series. Yep, you went right to insulting me.  No surprise why you are banned from ranked.  

BTW, maybe you should re-read your own post.  Did you ever mention bad players?  Yep.
